_header: When I have in my purse enough
_description: ‘Gramersy myn owyn purs’ — four quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Syng we alle & sey we thus / Gramersy myn owyn purs’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Quan I haue in myn purs inowI may haue bothe hors &
                    plow…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…As I pleyid me with a bowI seyd god quat is al
                    this
